<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>



</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Breaks block to scope named '''name'''. Nil is returned.

Scope name can be assigned using [[scopeName]] command. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''breakTo''' name </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> name: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[scopeName]] "main";
while {[[true]]} do {
	[[scopeName]] "loop1";
	while {[[true]]} do {
		[[scopeName]] "loop2";
		if (condition1) then {[[breakTo]] "main"}; // Breaks all scopes and return to "main"
		if (condition2) then {[[breakOut]] "loop2"}; // Breaks scope named "loop2"
		[[sleep]] 1;
	};
	[[sleep]] 1;
};
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[scopeName]], [[breakOut]], [[exitWith]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 18, 2017 - 18:19 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command can not be used to re-execute scopes in which command is inside of. Example:
<code>scopeName "whatever";
if true then {
   breakTo "whatever"
};
</code>
The example above will not make the engine jump back to line 1 and re-execute the 2nd line. Instead, it will just jump across line 2 to line 5 if it [ line 5 ] exists.
</dd>
</dl>
